products.name: Wireless Bluetooth Headphones Pro
products.description: Premium over-ear wireless headphones with active noise cancellation, 40-hour battery life, and Hi-Res Audio support. Features comfortable memory foam ear cushions and foldable design for travel.

products.name: Smart Watch Series X
products.description: Advanced smartwatch with health monitoring, GPS tracking, water resistance up to 50m, and 7-day battery life. Compatible with iOS and Android. Includes heart rate, SpO2, and sleep tracking.

products.name: Portable Power Bank 20000mAh
products.description: High-capacity portable charger with fast charging support (65W PD), dual USB-C ports, and LED display showing remaining power. Can charge laptops, tablets, and phones simultaneously.

products.name: Mechanical Gaming Keyboard RGB
products.description: Full-size mechanical keyboard with hot-swappable switches, per-key RGB lighting, programmable macros, and dedicated media controls. Features aircraft-grade aluminum frame.

products.name: Wireless Gaming Mouse Pro
products.description: Ultra-lightweight wireless gaming mouse with 25K DPI sensor, 70-hour battery life, and 8 programmable buttons. Features PTFE feet for smooth gliding and RGB lighting.

products.name: 4K Webcam with Microphone
products.description: Professional 4K webcam with auto-focus, built-in noise-canceling microphones, and adjustable field of view. Perfect for streaming, video calls, and content creation.

products.name: USB-C Hub 10-in-1
products.description: Versatile USB-C hub with HDMI 4K@60Hz, 3x USB 3.0, SD/microSD readers, Ethernet port, 100W PD pass-through, and 3.5mm audio jack. Aluminum body with built-in cable.

products.name: Noise Canceling Earbuds
products.description: True wireless earbuds with hybrid active noise cancellation, transparency mode, and 8-hour playback (32 hours with case). IPX5 water resistant with wireless charging.

products.name: Smart LED Light Bulbs 4-Pack
products.description: WiFi-enabled smart bulbs with 16 million colors, dimmable, voice control compatible (Alexa, Google Home), and scheduling features. A19 shape, 800 lumens, energy efficient.

products.name: Robot Vacuum Cleaner Pro
products.description: Smart robot vacuum with LiDAR navigation, 3000Pa suction, auto-empty dock, and multi-floor mapping. Features app control, scheduling, and 180-minute runtime.

products.name: Air Purifier HEPA Large Room
products.description: True HEPA air purifier covering up to 1500 sq ft, removes 99.97% of particles. Features quiet sleep mode, air quality sensor, and filter replacement indicator.

products.name: Smart Thermostat
products.description: Energy-saving smart thermostat with learning capabilities, remote control via app, geofencing, and compatibility with most HVAC systems. Sleek touchscreen display.

products.name: Instant Pot Multi-Cooker 8Qt
products.description: Versatile 8-quart pressure cooker with 11 cooking functions: pressure cook, slow cook, rice, steam, saut√©, and more. Stainless steel inner pot and safety features.

products.name: Smart Door Lock
products.description: Keyless smart door lock with fingerprint, keypad, app, and key access. Auto-lock feature, activity logs, and guest codes. Works with Alexa and Google Home.

products.name: Coffee Maker with Grinder
products.description: 12-cup programmable coffee maker with built-in conical burr grinder, strength control, and thermal carafe. Features auto-start and freshness timer.

products.name: Yoga Mat Premium 6mm
products.description: Extra thick eco-friendly yoga mat with alignment lines, non-slip surface, and carrying strap. Made from TPE material, latex-free, and easy to clean.

products.name: Adjustable Dumbbell Set 50lb
products.description: Space-saving adjustable dumbbells ranging from 5-50 lbs with quick-change mechanism. Durable steel construction with comfortable grip handles.

products.name: Resistance Bands Set 5-Pack
products.description: Set of 5 resistance bands with varying tension levels (10-50 lbs), door anchor, ankle straps, and carrying bag. Perfect for home workouts and physical therapy.

products.name: Foam Roller High Density
products.description: High-density foam roller 18-inch for muscle recovery, deep tissue massage, and myofascial release. Textured surface for targeted pressure points.

products.name: Running Shoes Ultralight
products.description: Lightweight running shoes with responsive cushioning, breathable mesh upper, and durable rubber outsole. Suitable for road running and daily training.

products.name: Fitness Tracker Band
products.description: Slim fitness tracker with step counting, heart rate monitoring, sleep tracking, and 14-day battery life. Water resistant and smartphone notifications.

products.name: Ergonomic Office Chair
products.description: Adjustable ergonomic chair with lumbar support, breathable mesh back, 4D armrests, and tilt mechanism. Supports up to 300 lbs with smooth-rolling casters.

products.name: Standing Desk Electric 60x30
products.description: Electric height-adjustable standing desk with memory presets, anti-collision technology, and cable management. Supports up to 350 lbs with quiet motors.

products.name: Monitor Light Bar
products.description: LED monitor light bar with asymmetric optical design, adjustable color temperature, auto-dimming sensor, and USB power. Reduces eye strain for extended use.

products.name: Wireless Keyboard and Mouse Combo
products.description: Slim wireless keyboard and mouse combo with quiet keys, long battery life, and reliable 2.4GHz connection. Includes USB receiver and batteries.

products.name: Document Scanner Portable
products.description: Portable document scanner with 600 DPI resolution, auto-feed, and duplex scanning. Connects via USB-C, compatible with Windows and Mac. Includes OCR software.

products.name: Bookshelf Speakers Pair
products.description: Premium bookshelf speakers with 5.25-inch woofers, silk dome tweeters, and 100W power handling. Rich, detailed sound for music and home theater.

products.name: Soundbar with Subwoofer
products.description: 2.1 channel soundbar system with wireless subwoofer, Bluetooth, HDMI ARC, and multiple EQ modes. Delivers immersive 200W surround sound experience.

products.name: Turntable Vinyl Record Player
products.description: Belt-drive turntable with built-in preamp, Audio-Technica cartridge, and adjustable counterweight. Includes dust cover and USB output for digitization.

products.name: Portable Bluetooth Speaker
products.description: Waterproof portable speaker with 360-degree sound, 24-hour battery life, and durable construction. Features built-in microphone and party pairing mode.

products.name: Gaming Headset 7.1 Surround
products.description: Gaming headset with virtual 7.1 surround sound, detachable noise-canceling microphone, memory foam ear pads, and RGB lighting. USB and 3.5mm connectivity.

products.name: Game Controller Wireless
products.description: Wireless game controller compatible with PC, iOS, and Android. Features motion controls, rumble feedback, 40-hour battery, and customizable buttons.

products.name: Gaming Monitor 27" 165Hz
products.description: 27-inch IPS gaming monitor with 165Hz refresh rate, 1ms response time, FreeSync/G-Sync compatible, and HDR400. Height-adjustable stand included.

products.name: RGB Mousepad Extended
products.description: Extended gaming mousepad (900x400mm) with RGB edge lighting, smooth micro-textured surface, and anti-slip rubber base. USB-powered with multiple lighting modes.

products.name: Travel Backpack 40L
products.description: Carry-on sized travel backpack with laptop compartment, anti-theft pockets, and luggage strap. Water-resistant fabric with comfortable padded straps.

products.name: Neck Pillow Memory Foam
products.description: Ergonomic memory foam travel pillow with adjustable clasp, breathable cover, and carrying bag. Provides 360-degree neck support for flights and road trips.

products.name: Packing Cubes Set 6-Piece
products.description: Set of 6 packing cubes in various sizes with durable zippers and mesh panels. Keeps luggage organized and maximizes suitcase space.

products.name: Portable Water Bottle 32oz
products.description: Insulated stainless steel water bottle keeping drinks cold 24 hours or hot 12 hours. Leak-proof lid, BPA-free, and fits most cup holders.

products.name: Electric Toothbrush Smart
products.description: Sonic electric toothbrush with pressure sensor, 5 brushing modes, 2-minute timer, and Bluetooth app connectivity. Includes 3 brush heads and travel case.

products.name: Hair Dryer Professional
products.description: Professional ionic hair dryer with 1875W motor, 3 heat settings, cold shot button, and concentrator attachments. Reduces frizz and drying time.
